 [x]
 (let [file (:file x)
 in-path (:in-path x)
 out-path (:out-path x)
 exec (:exec x)
 full-in-path (str (:in-path x) "/" (:file x))]
 (cond (not (file-exists? full-in-path)) 
 (throw 
 (IllegalArgumentException.
 (str full-in-path " file does not exist")))
 (not (dir-exists? in-path))
 (throw
 (IllegalArgumentException. 
 (str in-path " is not a directory")))
 (not (dir-exists? out-path))
 (throw 
 (IllegalAccessException. 
 (str out-path " is not a directory")))
 :else
 (do
 (io/copy
 (io/file (str in-path "/" file))
 (io/file (str out-path "/" file)))
 (assoc x :result (vector (str full-in-path)

 [x]
 (let [file (:file x)
 path (:path x)
 file-path (str path "/" file)]
 (if (file-exists? file-path)
 (do
 (FileUtils/write
 (File. file-path)
 (FileUtils/readFileToString
 (File. file-path) "UTF-8") "ISO-8859-1")
 (assoc x :result
 (vector (str (:path x) "/" (:file x)))))
 (throw 
 (IllegalArgumentException. 
 (str file-path " is not a file (or a directory)"))))))" "(defmethod cetl-encode-file :ISO-8859-1

 (assoc x :result
 (vector (str (:path x) "/" (:file x)))))
